titleStmt.title: The malignants trecherous and bloody plot against the Parliament and Citty of Lo whc was by Gods providence happily prevented May 31. 1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed according to order by Io Hancock,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
An engraved plate depicting 12 scenes, with explanatory text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
